list.name: Django for Everybody

list.name: Modern JavaScript: ES6 Basics
list.program: In this project, you'll learn the most fundamental ES6 features and practice them with live hands-on examples. You'll start writing modern JavaScript and really understand why we need ES6.Mastering modern JavaScript starts with understanding the reasoning
